posts.title: New Overview
posts.contents:
Today’s update brings a new Overview design, which combines the previously separate Overview and Documents views into one hierarchy. So now all of your documents and overviews are in one place.

This has actually been in beta testing for almost two months now, and was put on hold because we had to urgently switch gears to make the chrome extension. Our beta testers have said this change has made the Overview much more useful for them, so we’re very excited to finally release it to everyone!

So just click on the hamburger icon at the top of a pane to open the new Overview, which will hopefully be more powerful for you now.
